common.ilgn: Tôi thích tin tức tuyệt vời!
common.fttoya: Lễ băng giá? Đó có phải là Thời điểm của năm rồi không?
common.iiabn: Nó có một chút... lanh lợi!
common.cold: We haven't even begun to prepare!
common.aeisk: Anything else I should know about?

pasture.pig_pen_description: Pigs are a great source of low maintenance meat

bulletin_message.000: Greetings and Salutations most venerable one. I am Brother Landon, and I bring great news!
bulletin_message.002: Yes! The nights are now much longer, and the temperatures colder! You should invest in some heaters and additional light sources immediately!
bulletin_message.003: Indeed! As you know; Frostfeast is a festival of giving. If you're a little rusty I can give you a reminder.
bulletin_message.004: Well, every year at Frostfeast, villages from around the realm send donations to the Church of Plenty. In exchange for these offerings, the Church will grant you a gift.
bulletin_message.004a: Frostfeast, isn't just about presents though! It's about the importance of sharing with others less fortunate.
bulletin_message.004b: It's now beginning to get very cold and very dark. A poor summer harvest could mean the collapse of a small village like yours. Not to mention those villages ill prepared for the cold.
bulletin_message.004c: I noticed! The colder your villagers get, the less capable they become. It's hard work trudging though all this snow when you're cold. It's very important that you start building heaters to stop your villagers from freezing!
bulletin_message.004d: Lights! Lights are important. You wont be able to see very far, and it's terribly gloomy without them. I think that's all - Are you ready?
bulletin_message.005: Excellent! Expect Sister Jenna shortly. She has been assigned this area of the realm and will carry with her a list of the most requested donations.
bulletin_message.006: Should you accept this task and succeed, you will in turn be rewarded with a gift from the Church. Goodbye for now.
bulletin_message.007: I couldn't help but notice that Tải lại giao diện người dùng are a little bit cold. Please accept this small token.
bulletin_message.008: Greetings and Salutations most venerable one. I am Sister Jenna and I am told you are expecting me.
bulletin_message.009: Good - then we mustn't tarry. Allow me to gather my thoughts a moment, and I shall return with the Church's request.
bulletin_message.010: Greetings and Salutations most venerable one.
bulletin_message.011: I'm afraid the situation is dire. This winter is much colder than expected and we require more from you than before. Of course... the greater the challenge, the greater the reward.
bulletin_message.012: Oh.. I'm very sorry to hear that. Are you sure you're not interested in helping the poor unfortunate orphans of this realm?
bulletin_message.013: Well.. I never!.. We shall not bother you again. Blessings upon you.. most venerable one.

dialog_nodes.trade_details: Hello [str(i18n_data.town_name)]! The Church of Plenty makes the following request. If you provide us with [str(i18n_data.want_number)] [str(i18n_data.want_item)]s, Tôi sẽ quay lại [str(i18n_data.num_days)] day and will present the following tokens of our appreciation: [str(i18n_data.reward_number)] [str(i18n_data.reward_item)]s. If you can get us another [str(i18n_data.optional_want_number)] [str(i18n_data.optional_want_item)]s, you will receive an additional [str(i18n_data.optional_reward_number)] [str(i18n_data.optional_reward_item)].
dialog_nodes.waiting_title: Sister Jenna will return in [str(i18n_data.hour_counter)] giờ!
dialog_nodes.waiting_text: Sister Jenna will return in [str(i18n_data.hour_counter)] giờ để đưa cho bạn [str(i18n_data.reward_number)] [str(i18n_data.reward_item)]s nếu bạn có [str(i18n_data.want_number)] [str(i18n_data.want_item)]s ready for her! Should you get an additional [str(i18n_data.optional_want_number)] [str(i18n_data.optional_want_item)], she will also give you [str(i18n_data.optional_reward_number)] [str(i18n_data.optional_reward_item)]s!
dialog_nodes.rejected_text: Perhaps asking for [str(i18n_data.want_number)] [str(i18n_data.want_item)]s was too much? I understand. It can be difficult for a young settlement to find something extra to give. I will return another time.
dialog_nodes.return_greetings_positive: Excellent! It looks like you've made me the [str(i18n_data.want_number)] [str(i18n_data.want_item)]s we require. Are you still willing to trade them to me? Tôi sẽ đưa bạn [str(i18n_data.reward_number)] [str(i18n_data.reward_item)]s đổi lại. Vẫn còn âm thanh tốt?
dialog_nodes.return_greetings_excellent: Amazing! It looks like you've made me the [str(i18n_data.want_number)] [str(i18n_data.want_item)]s we require. You've even got the [str(i18n_data.optional_want_number)] [str(i18n_data.optional_want_item)]s! Are you still willing to trade them to me? Tôi sẽ đưa bạn [str(i18n_data.reward_number)] [str(i18n_data.reward_item)]s and an additional [str(i18n_data.optional_reward_number)] [str(i18n_data.optional_reward_item)]s đổi lại. Vẫn còn âm thanh tốt?
dialog_nodes.return_greetings_negative: Tôi đã trở lại, nhưng có vẻ như bạn không có [str(i18n_data.want_number)] [str(i18n_data.want_item)]s I asked for. Oh well, the poor orphaned and homeless children will understand... I'm sure...
